In gazebo 7.9 setting specular via SDF does not work, but setting via an ogre material script does. The top left two sphere have a specular value set via an ogre material. The bottom left two have the same specular value set via sdf.

![specular_script_vs_sdf.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2845670764-specular_script_vs_sdf.png)

In ogre the fourth component of specular is a [shinyness value from 1 to 128](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/api/1.10/Material-Scripts.html#specular). Maybe SDFormat is loading this into a color class that is clamping the fourth value as if it was alpha (0-1.0)?
